settings.text: Our exclusive membership for those supporting the development of our unique distillery.

The Kingsbarns Distillery Foundersâ€™ Club launched on St Andrews day 2015 and allowed members to be involved as we pave our way into the whisky industry. Today, we are still paving our way and finding our spot in this diverse and ever-evolving industry. We would like to invite you to join us and be a part of our story!

We have a passion for whisky, driven by our enthusiasm for innovating, experimenting and forging new paths and techniques in our production. We are always in pursuit of achieving that perfect balance of spirit and wood in all releases of Kingsbarns. Follow along with us on our journey as we discover perfectly balanced expressions of single malt scotch whisky.
